meanings.definition: An essential amino acid that is a constituent of most proteins.
meanings.sent1: Histidin is important for building proteins in our body.
meanings.sent2: Proteins contain histidin, which is necessary for our health.
meanings.sent3: Why did the protein go to school? To learn more about histidin!
meanings.sent4: Histidin is like the building blocks of a protein skyscraper.
meanings.sent5: Imagine histidin as the tiny bricks that make up a strong protein wall.
